name: Until The Light Comes [GBJAM 9]
description:
Until The Light Comes is a procedural platformer made for #gbjam 9.  Travel as far as you can through the dangerous cave!

Game Tips:

Avoid Bomb Traps!

Your pickaxe can also be used as a weapon! Knock out some enemies while mining!

Jumping the enemy's head will knock them out instantly!

Keyboard Controls:

A / D - Move Left / Right

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Mine / Attack

Ctrl + W - Mine / Attack Up

Ctrl + S - Mine / Attack Down

P - Start / Pause Game

O - Change Color Palette (In Menu)

Gamepad Controls:

Pad Left / Right - Move Left / Right

Left Face Button (PS: Square) - Mine / Attack

Left Face Button (PS: Square) + Pad Up - Mine / Attack Up

Left Face Button (PS: Square) + Pad Down - Mine / Attack Down

Bottom Face Button (PS: X) - Jump

Start - Start / Pause Game

Select - Change Color Palette (In Menu)

Credits:

Alberto (@sralbertooo) - Developer

Crase (@DennisPinato) - Artist

Bibiki (@BibikiGL) - Sound Effects & Music
